data.title: Blake Lively
data.meta_description: Get the latest blake lively news, articles, videos and photos on Page Six.
data.text:
Best star snaps of the week: Summer fun with Camila Cabello, Kim Kardashian and Pete Davidson

Camila Cabello, Kim Kardashian and Pete Davidson frolic in the sea, Emily Ratajkowski sets Firenze on fire with her son and more snaps of stars having fun in the summer...

Blake Lively's Met Gala 2022 gown had a 'Gossip Girl' connection

“I think Versace thought I was crazy when I called them and pitched this,” the gala co-host said of her color-changing couture.

The best Met Gala 2022 red carpet looks from Blake Lively to Kim Kardashian and more!

The Met Gala is back — and from the guest list to the red carpet, this year’s ball was bigger than ever before. A-listers embraced the evening's theme: “gilded glamour” as its...

Blake Lively pairs overalls with $60K in jewels on Martha Stewart's farm

The "Gossip Girl" star accessorized her denim look with a rainbow gemstone necklace and matching earrings from jeweler Brent Neale.

Met Gala 2022 hosts include Blake Lively, Ryan Reynolds and Regina King

The three stars, along with Lin-Manuel Miranda, were announced as chairs of the annual fashion event, taking place May 2 at the Met.

Blake Lively wows in rainbow Versace and a denim jacket

The star wore a stunning sherbert-colored gown — and a jean jacket — to the premiere of husband Ryan Reynolds' new movie, "The Adam Project."

Blake Lively and sister Robyn match at Michael Kors show during NYFW

The Lively siblings were all smiles during a rare red carpet appearance together at New York Fashion Week.

Blake Lively jokes about going incognito with 'Blake' purse

Taylor Swift's "I Bet You Think About Me" music video director announced her role with fashion, sporting a flashy "Blake" purse and "director" hat.

Taylor Swift gives middle finger to 'decimated' Jake Gyllenhaal in video, fans say

I bet you Jake Gyllenhaal is still thinking about his ex-girlfriend Taylor Swift, at least that’s what fans are thinking. Since the infamous red knit scarf appeared in “I Bet...

Taylor Swift parties with ex Joe Jonas, Sophie Turner after ‘SNL’ gig

Following her performance on "Saturday Night Live," Swift headed to an after party with Joe Jonas, Sophie Turner, Blake Lively, Ryan Reynolds and more.

Blake Lively paints her $995 Manolo Blahnik shoes with nail polish

The actress got creative while putting together her head-to-toe red look, DIY'ing her designer heels with nail lacquer.

Blake Lively blasts 'disturbing' Instagram post of her and Ryan Reynolds' kids

"This is so disturbing. I've personally shared with you that these men stalk and harass my children. And you are still posting. You said you would stop."

Blake Lively gets cheeky in thong bikini to promote Ryan Reynolds' movie

“Go see @freeguymovie this weekend or you’ll be bummed," the actress captioned her saucy swimsuit shot.

Halle Berry felt the 'Oscar curse' after her historic 2002 win

Blake Lively makes red carpet return in an ab-baring gown

The blond beauty was accompanied by her husband Ryan Reynolds, who stars in the film "Free Guy."

Blake Lively let her 4-year-old daughter style her outfit

Lively showed off the all-pink outfit her daughter Inez picked out for her at 5 a.m. as the two got dressed for the day.
